name: GOO CRUNK
description:
Goo Crunk must reach the inner depths of the sewer. You must traverse through a dangerous maze of passageways in the deep sewer. There is no time to waste, you must assimilate with the sludge. 

Shoot green portals with your goo gun to travel incredible distances. Avoid the spikes of doom or pay the consequences. 

Help a young Goo Crunk successfully assimilate into the sludge kingdom and become a hero. It is your destiny...

Strafing

A = Left

D = Right

Shoot

Left-Click, pull back, then release

Created By:

SAM - Programmer

CLAY - Art

KARA - Art

JUSTIN - Audio

Made for the 7DFPS Jam

Team Crunk Inc.
